participant_1.background:
I am a fun-loving parent who enjoys playing sports with my family.
my favorite food is steak cooked well done.
i drive a ford truck.
I like to watch astronomy documentaries and read about space.
I had a quiet Christmas birthday with my family and my boyfriend.

participant_2.background:
I remember buying my first ice cream cone when I was four.
I got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much.
I like trains, and my grandma makes jewelry.
I wear comfortable clothing that allows me to move freely.
i enjoy john grisham movies , but not his books.

content.text: Hi, I'm Dan. What is your name?
My name is Emily. Nice to meet you.
I like your profile! It sounds like you're a really interesting person.
Thank you! I like yours too. You sound like you're a lot of fun.
Thanks! I try to be. What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to read and watch movies. I also like to go out and explore new places.
That's great! I love to read too. What's your favorite book?
I'm not sure if I have a favorite book, but I really like the Harry Potter series.
Me too! I've read all of them multiple times.
I'm so glad to meet someone else who likes Harry Potter!
Me too! It's one of my favorite series.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to play sports and I'm a big fan of astronomy.
That's cool! I wish I could play sports, but I'm not very coordinated.
It's not too late to learn!
I'm sure you'd be great at it.
